items.title: Animal Crossing’s big 3.0 update has fans itching to return to the cozy life

items.title: Autel’s AC Lite Home smart AI 40A level 2 EV charger with voice assistant and RFID security card falls back to $319 low
items.summary:
Heading over to Autel’s official Amazon storefront, you can find the brand’s MaxiCharger AC Lite Home 40A EV Charger at $319 shipped in both dark gray and white colorways, which beats out the direct website pricing by $57. While Amazon has it priced for $470 in full, it can more often be scored down at $399, with some discounts over the last year having dipped things lower to $376, $349, and the $319 low. That all-time low price is coming back around now, giving you the best tracked rate we have seen while upgrading your EV charging game to more intelligent heights. You can also find the AC Elite Home 50A Smart AI Level 2 EV Charger still keeping to its new $450 low.

items.title: US to suspend visa processing for 75 nations next week, Fox News reports
items.summary: WASHINGTON, Jan ‌14 (Reuters) - The Trump administration is suspending ‌all visa processing for visitors ‌from 75 countries starting January 21, Fox News reported on Wednesday, citing a memo from ‍the U.S. State Department. Read full story

items.title: Italian judge acquits influencer Chiara Ferragni over charity fraud claims
items.summary: MILAN, Jan 14 (Reuters) - An Italian judge ‌on Wednesday acquitted Italian fashion influencer Chiara Ferragni on charges of fraud over ‌allegedly misleading claims linked to charity sales of a Christmas cake and Easter ‌eggs, judicial and legal sources said. Read full story

items.title: Exclusive-Armed Kurdish groups sought to cross into Iran from Iraq, sources say
items.summary: DUBAI, Jan 14 (Reuters) - Armed Kurdish separatist groups sought ‌to cross the border into Iran from Iraq, three sources ‌familiar with the matter told Reuters, in a sign of foreign entities potentially seeking to take advantage of instability after days of crackdown on protests against ‍Tehran. Read full story

items.title: Tesla will only offer subscriptions for Full Self-Driving (Supervised) going forward
items.summary: It's a huge change to Tesla's approach with FSD, and it could impact Musk's $1T pay package and the company's myriad legal troubles.

items.title: Portugal presidential race wide open with far-right just ahead, rare runoff vote is likely
items.summary: LISBON, ‌Jan 14 (Reuters) - Portugal's presidential election on Sunday is all but guaranteed to require a ‌runoff vote for the first time in 40 years amid growing political fragmentation, and ‌the race for a place in the second round is still wide open, a new opinion poll showed. Read full story

items.summary:
Today’s game deals post is headlined by one of last year’s best side-scrolling action titles – NINJA GAIDEN: Ragebound. Amazon is now offering the Switch edition down at $33.21 while the PS5 version is selling for $34, both with free shipping for Prime members or in orders over $35. Regularly $40, deals have been relatively hard to come by on this one with the Switch version now siting at a new Amazon all-time low and the PS5 copy at sitting within few bucks (this one was down a few bucks lower earlier this week). Just take note that these are boxed copies and you can land a digital copy for $25 on the PlayStation Store or the eShop. Head below for more of this week’s best game deals.

JBL Quantum 100 Wired Over-Ear Gaming Headphones

Buy for $20 (Reg. $45)

What we love

It doesn’t get much better than this if you’re after budget headset for gaming. The Quantum 100 is a wired over-ear set with a detachable mic and memory-foam cushions. It uses a standard 3.5mm jack for broad compatibility with PC and consoles, and its tuning – according to JBL – focuses on keeping in-game audio clear and easy to pick apart, similar to how it’s done in some of its more expensive models.
